# **AI vs. Non-AI Job Growth: Displacement or Innovation?**  

Artificial Intelligence is reshaping the global workforce. From automation replacing clerical jobs to AI creating **entirely new industries**, the job market is undergoing a **rapid transformation**.  

- **Who wins and who loses?**  
- **Which industries are AI-powered and which ones remain untouched?**  
- **How should job seekers adapt to this shift?**  

This report **analyzes real-world job market data** to separate **hype from reality**.
